text:
What a fun question! I love having built in time for expansive thinking as well. So productive!

I like to spend a bit of time thinking about how I want to feel at the end of a project. I find that this nudges my thinking toward relationships, _how_ we want to show up to a given project. Like yes, we want X results for the project, but what would feel really, really good is if we got to the end of the project and we found that we had formed a fantastic relationship with that other team and we're sharing the win together.

user_profile.real_name: Janessa Lantz, VP of Marketing at dbt Labs
user_profile.name: janessalantz
